artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; sketchy horizontal bands of color, fading to white at right--orange, yellow, pink

title: Misty window coldly facing distant sky dusk, from a set of 24 poems
